title: LFG for Odyssey (Team Composition Missions)
body:
Heya,

Thought I'd try my luck on here to find a team to do the team composition quests for Odyssey with (i.e. Perfect Composition, Space Wizard's Guild, and Morning Star Veterans) before the event ends. Unfortunately, I can only play at night during the week due to hectic uni things going on, but hit me up in-game if you wanna have a go! 

IGN: Perfected

Thanks!

replies.body: Exact same with me! Added you.
